issue.title: [C++] BufferOutputStream dtor does not call Close()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-455](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-455). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Close() resizes the buffer, so that the buffer being written to will report the correct length after writing is completed
